popularity.description: The popularity of a track is based on its recent global play count.

energy.description: The energy of a track reflects its intensity and activity. Energetic tracks convey a sense of speed, loudness, and liveliness.

danceability.description: The danceability of a track reflects how good a track is for dancing.

acousticness.description: The acousticness of a track measures how much a track relies on natural, non-electronic sounds like instruments and vocals.

instrumentalness.description: The instrumentalness of a track gauges the presence of vocals. "Ooh" and "Aah" vocals are considered as instrumentals.
